name: The Environment
description:
Hello

This is a game which teaches you a very beautiful lesson through adventure

Story line:

This is a game where you wake up, and find out humans have destroyed the earth through many years of pollution, and self destruction. You are given a second chance where you must go back, water plants, clean trash, and take care of the planet like we all should! 

This was a small game made in a day for a Game Jam, enjoy!

if you think the game is not polished then u might be right because this was a game jam game created under one day (Extra credits game jam 2020) even though this was 3 days i made it under 1 day because i had some other work too.

if you find bugs or anything like that then feel free to tell me

browser available but if laggy then download
